alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Jefferson; Mercer; Venango; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 6:47PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT MERCER...VENANGO...NORTHERN BUTLER... INDIANA...JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND...ARMSTRONG...CLARION AND FOREST COUNTIES... At 647 PM EDT, snow showers were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Guys Mills to 10 miles east of Kittanning to near Homer City to Westmont to near Berlin. Movement was east at 25 mph. Locations impacted include... Hermitage, Indiana, Oil City, Grove City, Franklin, Punxsutawney, Clarion, Kittanning, Brookville, Marienville, Homer City, and Knox. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 112 and 137. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 13 and 96. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and worsening travel conditions. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this intense snow shower. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Jefferson; Mercer; Venango; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges
